title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: UDL-Based Simplified Reading to Enhance Scientific Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Improved ability to analyze complex scientific texts using a three-stage summarization framework (core concepts-experimental results-implications)
Can enhance comprehension of scientific passages by over 30% using visual organizers (concept maps, flowcharts) based on UDL principles

Through three peer feedback sessions and two formative assessments by instructors, learners can identify and correct five major error types (grammar, data interpretation, structure, references, logical consistency) in scientific reports with 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
